FYI, the crawler project wiki, at...

     http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl

...has been upgraded to the 1.0 version of the UseMod wiki software.
(It was previously 0.92.)

The most notable new feature is the ability to view 'Recent Changes'
as an RSS feed. Try for example:

     http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?action=rss

Because of random link-spammer vandals, we've changed the password
required for editting the wiki. However, we welcome topical contributions
and edits from anyone interested in the Heritrix project. Just mail me
or one of the other Internet Archive project team members for the edit
password.

The edit password must now be entered into the 'Administrator/Editor
Password' box on the 'Preferences' page before you will be able to see
the 'Edit text of this page' links at the bottom of each page.

- Gordon @ IA
